main.name: Manny Contreras
main.description: Senior Information Technology leader with extensive experience driving business growth through innovative ideas. 10+ years technical experience as an IT Professional. Strong history of success in building information systems, network implementation/ administration in various industries (Entertainment, Animation, Adverting, Radio, Game VFX, Real Estate).

resume.skillmessage: A senior IT Professional with over a decade of Technology experience

work.title: Senior IT Manager
work.description: Managed small IT staff with along with supporting a 140+ growing staff. Responsible for updating and building a solid foundation that represents growth throughout the company. Major SaaS deployment in the following areas, Jamf, Crowd Strike, SnipeIT, Phishing Threat Prevention.

work.title: IT Director
work.description: Managed offices in L.A/NY & overseas (London, India) responsible for expanding new presence in Delhi India.
